SEARCH
Package Server.URLQueue

Class URLQueue

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Server.URLQueue.URLQueue
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, URLQueueInterface
public class URLQueue extends UnicastRemoteObject implements URLQueueInterface
Represents a URL queue that stores URLs and provides methods to enqueue and dequeue URLs.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

      public void enqueueURL(URL url, int downloaderID) throws RemoteException
      Adds a URL to the queue.
      Specified by:

      url - The URL to enqueue.

    • listenIndexURLRequest

      public void listenIndexURLRequest()
      Listens for incoming index URL requests and enqueues them for processing. This method runs in a loop until the server is stopped.

    • priorityEnqueueURL

      public void priorityEnqueueURL(URL url) throws RemoteException
      Adds a URL to the priority queue.
